text: Muminasakalara majata yisakala aksama nahaya athaca gharata bahi thake arau yisakale allahara pathata nijara dhana-praanara dbaraa jihada karae te'omloka samana nahaya. Yisakale nijara dhana-praanara dbaraa jihada karae allahe te'omlokaka yisakale gharata bahi thake sihamtara oparata maryada pradana karaiche, sihamta pratyekarae babe allahe jannatara pratisrauti diche. Yisakale gharata bahi thake sihamtara oparata yisakale jihada karae te'omlokaka allahe mahapuraskarara ksetrata sraesthatba pradana karaiche
